title: Qualitative and biochemical characteristics of pomegranate fruit grown using reclaimed water and low input fertigation treatments at harvest and during storage
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Michela Palumbo, Virginia Carbone, Ilde Ricci, Bernardo Pace, Maria Cefola, Paola Minasi, Simone Pietro Garofalo, Salvatore Camposeo, Anas Tallou, Gaetano Alessandro Vivaldi
